To add or revoke a power of attorney:
1. Select 'Go to page'.
2. Select 'Submit new request'.
3. In the 'Account maintenance' section, select 'Add or revoke power of attorney' then follow the prompts.
To confirm if a power of attorney has been loaded to an account, select 'Chat with consultant'.
